name: Polymer
introduce:
Polymer, a multi-cluster networking protocol housed on Cosmos, aims to provide end-to-end (e2e) connectivity to chains and networks through inter-blockchain communication (IBC) infrastructure. Polymer's solution allows developers to build applications that abstract the problems of “siloed” blockchains away from the end-users. The ultimate goal is to create a universal IBC based router and rollup protocol for intercommunication across all chains and ecosystems.
The Polymer solution aims to supplement the IBC protocol of Cosmos by extending its capabilities so that chains outside of the Cosmos, or IBC-based ecosystem, can easily utilize and interact with the vast ecosystem of chains that are based on IBC.
